subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Josh Hamilton, a recovering cocaine addict who is trying to revive his baseball career with the Cincinnati Reds, has cleaned up his life and is back playing with the passion of a Little Leaguer.
snippet: Josh Hamilton, a recovering cocaine addict who is trying to revive his baseball career with the Cincinnati Reds, has cleaned up his life and is back playing with the passion of a Little Leaguer.
